analyzed: vihāre kāraye ramme vāsayettha bahu suta iti
santhavataḥ bhayam jāta niketā jāyate rajaḥ

original: Aniketamasanthavaṁ, etaṁ ve munidassanan’ti, tena hi ‘vihāre kāraye ramme, vāsayettha bahussute’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: etam tena hi vihāre kāraye ramme vāsayettha bahu suta iti yam tam micchā

original: ‘vihāre kāraye ramme, vāsayettha bahussute’ti, tena hi ‘santhavato bhayaṁ jātaṁ, niketā jāyate rajo.
analyzed: vihāre kāraye ramme vāsayettha bahu ssuta iti tena hi santhavataḥ bhayam jāta niketā jāyate rajaḥ

original: Aniketamasanthavaṁ, etaṁ ve munidassanan’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: etam ve muni dassananti tam pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti
santhavataḥ bhayam jāta niketā jāyate rajaḥ
vihāre kāraye ramme vāsayettha bahu suta iti
santhavataḥ bhayam jāta niketā jāyate rajaḥ

original: Aniketamasanthavaṁ, etaṁ ve munidassanan’ti, taṁ sabhāvavacanaṁ asesavacanaṁ nissesavacanaṁ
nippariyāyavacanaṁ samaṇānucchavaṁ samaṇasāruppaṁ samaṇappatirūpaṁ samaṇārahaṁ samaṇagocaraṁ
analyzed: nippariyāya vacanam samaṇa anucchavam samaṇa sāruppam samaṇa ppatirūpam samaṇa araham samaṇa gocara

original: Yathā, mahārāja, āraññako migo araññe pavane caramāno nirālayo aniketo yathicchakaṁ sayati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja āraññakaḥ migaḥ araññe pavane caramānaḥ nirālayaḥ aniketaḥ yathicchakam sayati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhikkhunā ‘santhavato bhayaṁ jātaṁ, niketā jāyate rajo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhikkhunā santhavataḥ bhayam jāta niketā jāyate rajaḥ
yam pana mahā rāja bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘vihāre kāraye ramme, vāsayettha bahussute’ti, taṁ dve atthavase sampassamānena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ.
analyzed: vihāre kāraye ramme vāsayettha bahu suta iti tam dve attha vase sampassamānena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: Vihāradānaṁ nāma sabbabuddhehi vaṇṇitaṁ anumataṁ thomitaṁ pasatthaṁ, taṁ te vihāradānaṁ datvā jātijarāmaraṇā parimuccissantīti.
analyzed: vihāra dānam nāma sabba buddhehi vaṇṇitam anumatam thomitam pasattha tam te vihāra dānam da tvā jāti jarā maraṇāḥ parimuccissanti iti

original: Puna caparaṁ vihāre vijjamāne bhikkhuniyo byattasaṅketā bhavissanti, sulabhaṁ dassanaṁ dassanakāmānaṁ, anikete duddassanā bhavissantīti.
analyzed: puna ca param vihāre vijjamāne bhikkhuniyaḥ byatta saṅketāḥ bhavissanti sulabham dassanam dassana kāmāna anikete duddassanāḥ bhavissanti iti

original: Ime dve atthavase sampassamānena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: ime dve attha vase sampassamānena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘vihāre kāraye ramme, vāsayettha bahussute’ti, na tattha buddhaputtena ālayo karaṇīyo nikete”ti.
analyzed: vihāre ramme vāsayettha bahu suta iti na tattha buddha puttena ālayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ nikete ti
sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti
